org.mindroid.android.app.fragments.log

Class GlobalLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mindroid.android.app.fragments.log.GlobalLogger

  • public class GlobalLogger
extends java.lang.Object
    Receives Logs from API and also contains logs from the APP. Opens a ServerSocket LogServer so its possible to access the log from the outside.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      boolean deleteLog()
      Deletes the Log File and clears the log cache.

      Returns the whole log in String format.

      void loadLog()
      Saves the current Log into the LogFile given by the path PATH_TO_LOGFILE and filename NAME_LOGFILE.
      void registerLogger(java.util.logging.Logger logger)
      All used Loggers need to be registered to the given logHandler.
      boolean saveLog()
      Saves the current Log into the LogFile given by the path PATH_TO_LOGFILE and filename NAME_LOGFILE.

      • loadLog

        public void loadLog()
        Saves the current Log into the LogFile given by the path PATH_TO_LOGFILE and filename NAME_LOGFILE. Appends the Log to the content of the File. calls method getLogFile()

        Saves the current Log into the LogFile given by the path PATH_TO_LOGFILE and filename NAME_LOGFILE. Appends the Log to the content of the File. calls method getLogFile() }

        public boolean deleteLog()
        Deletes the Log File and clears the log cache.
